title: Social Learning-Based Leadership Development for Enhancing Team Creativity

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational team project experience and understanding of organizational communication
context.additional_context: Utilization of digital collaboration tools (online whiteboards, real-time chat) alongside non-face-to-face discussion sessions

learning_goals: Learners demonstrate humble leadership behaviors (e.g., active listening, feedback acceptance) with ≥80% participation within teams
Learners can plan and implement ≥3 knowledge-sharing activities among team members using social learning mechanisms
Learners collaboratively produce creative outputs scoring ≥4 points (on a 5-point scale) based on team creativity rubric criteria
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
